item.description:
Hi All...

Another Happy Hour! Let share some bottles of wine or have a few drinks and maybe have some dinner.... if that's what you want, at this really wonderful and friendly neighborhood cafe.

7:30PM

Columbus Cafe (a very quaint and cozy neighborhood cafe)
535 Columbus Avenue
Boston, MA 02118
(617)247 9001
www.columbuscafeandbar.com (check them out on the web)

I hope to see you at the Columbus Cafe for some wine/drinks and maybe some dinner.

Cheers,
Michael
item.how_to_find_us: Reservation will be under Mike/Meet up

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Some Wine & maybe dinner at this really great neighborhood cafe
